data.text:
List of Smooth Radio frequencies (FM & AM)

This page is a list of Smooth Radio frequencies, a commercial radio station across the UK on both FM and AM (MW) playing a selection of older music, mainly from the 70s and 80s but with some 90s and 00s hits also. SmoothÂ is also available nationally on DAB Block 11D in England, Wales and Northern Ireland, DAB Block 12A in Scotland and the Channel Islands. Look for ‘Smooth UK‘ or ‘Smooth‘ on your radio display.

FM Frequencies

Frequency Broadcast Area 96.4 Hexham

Corbridge, Northumberland 97.2 Wellingborough & Rushden, Northamptonshire 97.5 Tyneside, County Durham & Northumberland 100.1 Kendal, Cumbria 100.4 North West England 100.8 Windermere, Cumbria 101.4 Keswick, Cumbria 101.4 Derby, Derbyshire 102.2 London 105.2 Glasgow & Edinburgh, Scotland 105.7 West Midlands 106.6 East Midlands 106.8 Peterborough 107.4 Kettering & Corby, Northamptonshire 107.5 Newcastle-upon-Tyne & Gateshead 107.7 Teesside & County Durham
